data.title: Meta's VR technology is helping to train surgeons and treat patients, though costs remain a hurdle
data.description: Virtual reality technology from Meta and other companies is finding its way into hospitals and medical schools even as it struggles to find consumer traction.

data.title: Texas paid bitcoin miner Riot $31.7 million to shut down during heat wave in August
data.description: Bitcoin miner Riot Platforms raked in $31.7 million in energy credits from Texas power grid operator ERCOT in August.

data.title: EU's crackdown on Apple, Meta and others is to avoid forced breakups, top official says
data.description: Big Tech is facing tighter scrutiny in the European Union, but officials want to avoid forcing them to break up parts of the business.

data.title: Roku stock jumps after company says it will lay off 10% of workforce
data.description: Roku Inc. said in a regulatory filing Wednesday, it will be laying off 10% of its workforce, or 360 people, as it raised its guidance for its third-quarter.

data.title: Kicked off Facebook for two years, Trump now leans on Meta to help fund his presidential run
data.description: Donald Trump's return to Facebook has helped his campaign to raise a ton of money throughout his legal struggles, including since his arrest in Georgia.

data.title: EU lists Alphabet, Amazon, Meta and three other tech giants as 'gatekeepers' under strict competition rules
data.description: The European Union on Tuesday unveiled a list of six designated "gatekeepers" set to come under its new Digital Markets Act.
